preference.name: IMM_SEARCH_BASED_ON_LAST_RELEASE_STATUS
preference.preference_description: Activates the search for material revisions based on the last Release Status. This is useful when the material revision has more than one Release Status. Valid Values: * false: The search criteria will consider any release status on the revision. This is the default value. * true: The search criteria will consider only the last_release_status of the revision.
